verses.1: Hihte pen Esau (Edom) suanlekhakte ahi hi.
verses.2: Esau in Kanaan numeite zi-in la hi. Hit mi Elonʼ tanu Adah, Hiv mi Zibeonʼ tapa Anahʼ tanu Oholibamah,
verses.3: le Nebaiothʼ sanggamnu, Ishmaelʼ tanu Basemath ahi hi.
verses.4: Adah in Esau tawh Elifaz nei a, Basemath in Reuel nei hi.
verses.5: Oholibamah in Jeush, Jalam le Korah nei hi. Hihte pen Kanaan gam sunga a neih Esauʼ tapate ahi hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin Esau in a zite, a tapate, a tanute le ama innkuan sunga mi khempeuh; a bawngte, a ganhingte khempeuh; le Kanaan gam sunga a lam a neihsa khempeuh la-in a sanggampa Jakob kiang panin gamdang khat ah paikhia hi.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh ten khop theih dingin amauʼ neihsate tam lua a, a ganhingte uh hangin tawl khat a omna uh leitang in amaute vak zo lo hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih ciangin Seir mual tung gamah Esau teeng hi. Esauʼ min dang khat pen Edom ahi hi.
verses.9: Hihte pen Seir mual tung gam a Edom miteʼ pupi Esauʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
verses.10: Esauʼ tapate: Esauʼ zi Adahʼ tapa Elifaz, Esauʼ zi Basemathʼ tapa Reuel ahi hi.
verses.11: Elifazʼ tapate: Teman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam le Kenaz ahi hi.
verses.12: (Timna pen Esauʼ tapa Elifazʼ zineu hi a, amah in Elifaz tawh Amalek nei hi.) Hihte pen Esauʼ zi Adahʼ tapate ahi hi.
verses.13: Reuelʼ tapate: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah le Mizzah ahi hi. Hihte pen Esauʼ zi Basemathʼ tapate ahi hi.
verses.14: Esauʼ zi, Zibeonʼ tapa Anahʼ tanu Oholibamah tapate: Jeush, Jalam le Korah ahi hi.
verses.15: Esauʼ suante hih bang ahi hi. Esauʼ ta masa Elifazʼ tate: Teman, Omar, Zefo, Kenaz,
verses.16: Korah, Gatam le Amalek ahi hi. Hihte pen Edom gam sungah Elifazʼ suante hi a, Esauʼ zi Adahʼ sunga piangte ahi hi.
verses.17: Esauʼ tapa Reuelʼ tapate: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah le Mizzah hi a, Edom gam sungah a om Reuelʼ suante ahi hi. Amaute pen Esauʼ zi Basemathʼ sung panin a piangte ahi hi.
verses.18: Esauʼ zi Oholibamahʼ tapate: Jeush, Jalam le Korah ahi hi. Hihte pen Esauʼ zi, Anahʼ tanu Oholibamahʼ sung panin a piangte ahi hi.
verses.19: Hihte pen Esau (Edom) suante hi a, amauteʼ sung pan beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
verses.20: Tua gam a teeng Hori mi Seirʼ tapate: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
verses.21: Dishon, Ezer le Dishan hi a, Edom gam sunga Seirʼ suante ahi Hori miteʼ sung pan beh lutang ahi uh hi.
verses.22: Lotanʼ tapate: Hori le Heman ahi hi. Lotanʼ sanggamnu Timna ahi hi.
verses.23: Shobalʼ tapate: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shefo le Onam ahi hi.
verses.24: Zibeonʼ tapate: Ai ah le Anah ahi hi. Amah pen a pa Zibeonʼ late a cin laitakin gamlak ah a sa ciktui a mu pa Anah ahi hi.
verses.25: Anahʼ tate: Dishon le Anahʼ tanu Oholibamah ahi hi.
verses.26: Dishonʼ tapate: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran le Kheran ahi hi.
verses.27: Ezerʼ tapate: Bilhan, Zaavan le Akan ahi hi.
verses.28: Dishanʼ tapate: Uz le Aran ahi hi.
verses.29: Hori miteʼ beh lutangte: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
verses.30: Dishon, Ezer le Dishan ahi hi. Hihte pen Seir gam sungah amauʼ beh ciatin Hori miteʼ sung pan beh lutang ahi uh hi.
verses.31: Hihte pen Israel mite tungah kumpi khat beek in a uk ma-in Edom gam sunga kumpite ahi hi.
verses.32: Beorʼ tapa Bela in Edom gam sung uk a, ama khuapi min Dinhabah ahi hi.
verses.33: Bela si a, Bozrah khuami Zerahʼ tapa Jobab in ama tangin a uk hi.
verses.34: Jobab si a, Teman miteʼ gam mi Husham in ama tangin a uk hi.
verses.35: Husham si a, Moab gam sungah Midian mite a zo Bedadʼ tapa Hadad in ama tangin uk a, ama khuapi min Avith ahi hi.
verses.36: Hadad si a, Masrekah khuami Samlah in ama tangin uk hi.
verses.37: Samlah si a, Eufratis gun gei-a Rehoboth khuami Shaul in ama tangin a uk hi.
verses.38: Shaul si a, Akborʼ tapa Baal-hanan in ama tangin a uk hi.
verses.39: Akborʼ tapa Baal-hanan si a, Hadar in ama tangin uk a, ama khuapi min Pau ahi hi. Ama ziʼ min Mehetabel hi a, Mezahabʼ tanu Matred, Matred tanu Mehetabel ahi hi.
verses.40: Amauʼ innkuan le a teenna, amauʼ min tawh kizui-in, Esauʼ suan sung pan minamteʼ min: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth,
verses.43: Magdiel le Iram ahi hi. Hihte in amauʼ neih, amauʼ teenna leitang min dingin amauʼ min mah vawh pah uh a, Esauʼ suan, Edom mi a kicite ahi uh hi.
